items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Hold the position for 30 seconds.
Switch legs and repeat for another 30 seconds.
For an added challenge, try closing your eyes or standing on a pillow or unstable surface.
Improves balance and stability
Strengthens the muscles in the legs, particularly the glutes, quadriceps, and calves
Increases ankle and foot strength
Improves proprioception (the body’s awareness of its position in space)
Can be done anywhere without equipment
Can be modified to increase difficulty by adding weights or closing eyes
Glutes
Quadriceps
